item.description:
This meetup is free to attend, will have the entire Cape Ann Brewing (Fisherman's) Crew there to hang out, free Cape Ann glassware to anyone who checks-in on Facebook, plenty of other giveaways, and lots of great beer!

Don't worry if you don't know anyone. Bring some friends, meet some new ones, and hang out with the awesome Cape Ann guys (who used to be fishermen on the Bering Sea, Deadliest Catch style)! We're already expecting a great crowd, so be sure to RSVP here and on the EventBrite page. http://capeanncheers.eventbrite.com/

Cape Ann is bringing some of their rarest, strongest, and tastiest beers. Barleywine, Double IPAs, Imperial Pumpkin Stout...11 in total. For full event details and to RSVP: http://capeanncheers.eventbrite.com/

I'll be there at 6:30 and will be wearing a black and white houndstooth fedora by the bar. So come say hello and meet your fellow Craft Beer Crew members!

Rich
item.name: Craft Beer Winter Meetup with Cape Ann Brewing at Cheers!
